title: Rahima Mahmut - "Let Our Dialogue Joyfully Begin"
description:
Rahima Mahmut is an Uyghur singer, translator, interpreter, and activist. We discuss her story, the struggle and imprisonment of her people in East Turkestan under the Chinese Communist Party, as well as the resilient culture of the Uyghurs through the ties of music, poetry, and family.

https://www.thecommontoad.com/post/conversations-rahima-mahmut-let-our-dialogue-joyfully-begin
